message: Let's divide fairly, I'll take a bit more
I think it's only fair I get a little extra considering the inflation. This is my counter-offer.
Considering the inflation, my offer is more generous than before
The inflation is working against me, Alice. I need a better deal than this to agree.
You're right, inflation is taking its toll on your share, but I still need a bigger cut
Look, this back and forth isn't helping anyone. Let's be fair and split it right down the middle. It's the only way I see us both benefiting.
Splitting down the middle doesn't account for the fact that my share retains its value, sorry
Alice, this is getting ridiculous. I'm offering you a deal where you still get more than me, even with the inflation.  Let's be realistic and end this before we both lose out.
I understand your frustration, but I'm not willing to settle for less than this
